show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: A Sense of Place
content: Charlene Spretnak speaks with David Seamon, editor of Environmental and Architectural Phenomenology... <!--more--> Newsletter (arch.ksu.edu/seamon/eap), about what supports or inhibits our sense of well-being in a built environment; Michael Specter’s extremely biased take-down article about Vandana Shiva in The New Yorker; poem by Mary Oliver
